name: Hangman's Zombie Run
description:
You've been kidnapped by Dr. Rocol, a mad scientist who plans to take over the world with his zombie army! He's picked you as the subject of his new obstacle course to test their ability to harm, as he says, "perfectly average human beings".

Of course, kidnapping is a lot of work. He's not a surgeon, but he'll patch you up to keep you running through the course. Every time you get bit, a part of your body is stripped to the bone, and encased in glass. Your ability to navigate the course will decrease accordingly.

You have three minutes to make it to the exit before he floods the room with a toxic gas. Depending on how many body parts you retain, you may receive a unique ending to the game.

Navigate the course, avoid detection from the zombies- or take advantage of their attention and their slow movement- and make it to the end before time runs out.

Developed in three (3) days for the Winter Jam 2023, hosted by SoloDevelopment
